documentId.description: Provides the Identifier(s) of the document being communicated. Uniquely identifies a Document within an organization.

name.description: Provide description for particular communication item

preference.description: Provide priority for given communication item

channelCode.description: Code identifying the usage of the contact point e.g. business, private, etc.

countryDialingCode.description: The country dialing code for a communication number.

areaDialingCode.description: The area dialing code for a communication number.

dialNumber.description: The communication number, not including country dialing or area dialing codes.

phoneExtension.description: The extension of the associated communication number.

access.description: The text that permits access to the electronic network of the associated communication number such as telephone network, for example 9, *70.

formattedNumber.description: Specifies details of an actual formatted number

extendedLine.description: The extended address (e.g. apartment or suite number).

countrySubDivisionCode.description: Qualifies the further division of the Country. These may be Districts, Regions, States, Provinces etc. A possible list of values is as specified in ISO 3166-2.

CommunicationType.title: CommunicationType
CommunicationType.description: allows capture of information about a variety of communication channels (telephone, email, fax, messaging, address, etc.)

PersonNameType.title: PersonNameType
PersonNameType.description: A collection of data representing a person name.

SpecifiedPersonType.title: SpecifiedPersonType
SpecifiedPersonType.description: Contains information to identify a person associated with the interaction or entity.

CommentType.title: CommentType
CommentType.description: A comment to provide additional unstructured information concerning the related entity.

Comment.title: Comment
Comment.description: A comment to provide additional unstructured information concerning the related entity.

PayRateType.title: PayRateType
PayRateType.description: Associates billing and/or pay rate information with time worked information reported on an entity.

ResponsibleType.title: ResponsibleType
ResponsibleType.description: A collection of information about the person who is the submitter/approver of the associated document.

person.description: Contains information identifying the person who has the role of submitter/approver.

datetime.description: The date the related document, report, or related entity was communicated to a receiving or approving entity.

PartyType.title: PartyType
PartyType.description: A collection of information about the party who is the supplier/customer/requester of the associated entity.

legalId.description: A government assigned identifier to distinguish the party (organization, person, or legal entity) to a transaction.

taxId.description: An identifer assigned by a government tax authority to distinguish the party (organization, person, or legal entity) to a transaction.

assignmentId.description: An identifier for a particular engagement or assignment of a staffing resource.

rfqId.description: Used to specify a reference to a StaffingRFQ document.

quoteId.description: Used to specify a reference to a StaffingQuote document.

actionId.description: Used to specify a reference to a StaffingAction document.

masterOrderId.description: Reference to a master order or project. Used to associate multiple orders.

items.title: CostAllocationType
items.description: Contains an identifier of an account, department, or other entity to which an item should be allocated.

WorkAllocationType.title: WorkAllocationType
WorkAllocationType.description: Contains piece of work rate table per type of work or quantity limits

ResourceClassification.title: ResourceClassification
ResourceClassification.description: Holds customer specific properties of an entity
